trackApplicationLifecycleEvents.description: Automatically send track for Lifecycle events, defaults to false

useLifecycleObserver.description: Enables the use of LifecycleObserver to track Application lifecycle events, defaults to false

trackDeepLinks.description: Automatically track deep links opened based on intents, defaults to false

flushAt.description: Count of events at which we flush events, defaults to 20

flushInterval.description: Interval in seconds at which we flush events, defaults to 30 seconds

defaultSettings.description: Settings object that will be used as fallback in case of network failure, defaults to empty

autoAddSegmentDestination.description: Automatically add SegmentDestination plugin, defaults to true

apiHost.description: Set a default apiHost to which Segment sends events, defaults to api.segment.io/v1

cdnHost.description: Set a default cdnHost for settings retrieval, defaults to cdn-settings.segment.com/v1

requestFactory.description: A block to call when requests are made

errorHandler.description: A block to be called when an error occurs

flushQueue.description: Specify a custom queue to use when performing a flush operation

jsonNonConformingNumberStrategy.description: Specifies how NaN/Infinity are handled when encoding JSON

storageMode.description: Specifies the storage mode to be used for events
